summary: She follows you, blocks you in doorways, sets off traps, carries your stuff. Also note the beta status is because she isn't custom voiced yet.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u][i][b]Really?...ANOTHER Follower?
[/b][/i][/u][size=3]Yes.
[u][i][b][size=6]Don't we have enough of them?
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]Oh yeah there is tons of followers on the nexus.
[u][i][b][size=6]So why should anyone use Olec?
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]She has daedric armour...DAEDRIC ARMOUR!!1!! (which you can't take off of her...you can try and get her to take it off but I wouldn't recommend it since she is also equipped with a daedric sword)
Honestly nobody is forcing you to use Olec I have my own reasons for creating Olec.
I'm really sorry if they don't coincide with your ideals of what a follower should or shouldn't be. lol j/k.
[u][i][b][size=6]Where Is She?
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]In the bannered mare in Whiterun getting wasted.[/size][/size]
[size=6][u][i][b]ABOUT[/b][/i][/u][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]

I'd like to add custom voice acting and expand her story more. I have a backstory written for her, but no real way of telling the player without a voice actress and quests, foolishly I made a female follower not a male one and I cant sound like a woman without sounding more like Kermit the frog.

[size=6][u][i][b]STATS:[/b][/i][/u]
[/size]100 One Handed
100 2 handed
15 archery
100 block
20 smithing
100 heavy armour
20 light armour
15 pickpocket
15 lockpick
68 sneak
15 alchemy
20 speech
15 alteration
15 conjuration
15 destruction
15 illusion
15 restoration
15 enchanting

capped level 50

[u][i][b][size=6]Marriageable?
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]No[/size][/size].

[u][i][b][size=6]Why Not?
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]She is asexual with no emotions.

[img]http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/9lyKxKn_WsE/hqdefault.jpg[/img][/size][/size]

[size=6][u][i][b]INSTALLATION
[/b][/i][/u][size=3]Just use the NMM or mod organiser.
[/size][u][i][b]LOAD ORDER?
[/b][/i][/u][size=3]Use LOOT [url=http://https://loot.github.io/]https://loot.github.io/[/url]

[/size][/size]
author: MorpheusPsyche
